raw_comment:
We noticed that the southern tip of Florida was the first to have the first sign of spring. Another thing we noticed is Wyoming and Colorado was the last states to have the last spring sign, the two states were mostly covered, but they had a little bit left that was white after all the other states were covered. 
We wonder what states will be fully covered first next year. Another thing we wonder is why some of the states are half covered by one color for one month, and the other half is covered from another month, like example, California. 
What we think might be going on in the graph is that it is showing us the first sign of spring, and how long it can take other states to have a first sign of spring based on where it is located.
ace_sentences: We noticed the southern tip of Florida.
The southern tip of Florida had the first sign of spring.
Wyoming was a last state to have the last spring sign.
Colorado was a last state to have the last spring sign.
A little part of Wyoming was white after all other states were covered.
A little part of Colorado was white after all other states were covered.
We wonder which states will be fully covered first next year.
We wonder why some states are half covered by one color for one month.
We wonder why the other half of such a state is covered in another month.
California is an example of such a state.
We think that the graph shows the first sign of spring.
We think that the graph shows how long it can take other states to have a first sign of spring.
We think that this depends on the location of a state.
